You may need to take a calcium supplement if you don't get enough of it from your diet, since milk and foods made with milk are the most common source of calcium for most people.    NIH: National Institute of Diabetes and Digestive and Kidney Diseases",MPlusHealthTopics,Lactose Intolerance
What is (are) Vitiligo ?,"Vitiligo causes white patches on your skin. It can also affect your eye
